QuestData.Title: The Voice of Iyu
QuestData.Description: Journal Entry 25 -$b$bThe botani got themselves a leader who calls himself... er... herself... er... itself the Voice of Iyu.$b$bSeems the botani see the genesaur as gods and only the most bossy of the botani get to speak on behalf of the genesaur.$b$bWhen we tried askin' it about the artifact we found back at the base it got all angry and sent off Lera and Nori and I ain't seen either of them since.$b$bI got a bad feelin' about this thing.
QuestData.RewardText: They mulched my friends? Those pointy branch wavers with their wee beady eyes! Thank ya for avenging ma friends.$b$bWe best be findin' the others before they get turned into plant food.
